findings.title: Authorization limit issue
findings.description: There are two roles Owner and Executor in the contract, and the permissions of the two roles are not clearly divided.

findings.title: Security suggestion
findings.description: Since the TransitSwapRouter contract will retain the user's authorization limit, it is recommended to allow the user to allocate on demand during the front-end authorization, and do not authorize the maximum value at one time to prevent the user's funds from being stolen.

findings.title: Owner has the risk of over-authorization
findings.description: The permissions of the two roles Owner and Executor are not clearly divided, leading to authorization limit issues.
